{props.children}
 ); }; export const Live = (props) => { const [msgs, setMsgs] = useState([]); const [notes, setNotes] = useState([]); const [textNote, setTextNote] = useState(''); const [text, setText] = useState(''); const sendMsg = () => { let newmsg = [...msgs]; if (text != '') { newmsg.push(text); setMsgs(newmsg); setText(''); } }; const SendNote = () => { let newNotes = [...notes]; if (textNote != '') { newNotes.push(textNote); setNotes(newNotes); setTextNote(''); } }; useEffect(() => { OpenPay.setSandboxMode(true); OpenPay.setId('mqrfjs0h2c8pxopp6c63'); OpenPay.setApiKey('pk_0da9497fbffc4c5996b42ce351972d92'); }, []); const createToken = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); OpenPay.token.extractFormAndCreate( $('#processCard'), successCard, errorCard ); }; const successCard = () => {}; const errorCard = () => {}; return (
